fulltext:
Ho Chi Minh
+66 968 579 446
ducnguyenhuynh90@gmail.com
 linkedin.com/in/nguyenhuynhduc
David Nguyen
Product Manager at Asia Innovations
Summary Summary    
1st job (Top Music Website): Top Employee of The Year: Help company growth hack by Google Adwords with
300k daily traffic more.
2nd job (Best Delivery For Ecommerce): Lead product team with good roadmap help company save 1 million
dollar/month. Promote to head of product.
3rd job: Lead an international product with big impact. Work with investor and ceo for product strategy for
Vietnam.
Education: Scholarship to Ajou University:  Made Smart-Chair IoT, Predicted Breast Cancer Model 98%
(Machine Learning),...
Work experience
Work experience    
Product Manager
2016-01 - NOW
Asia Innovations Group
Built Product Roadmap and report for CEO and investor. Write product spec, wireframe and tracking
performance of new feature. Designed and commissioned market research that produced data used to set
product direction. Lead weekly sprints.
_ Uplive (Livestream App)
Defined important metric to track and analysis which help prioritize and improve product backlog.
Increased customer retention by 30% by redesigning Welcome screen: suggest user follow the hottest idols,
then the user receives notification for the app.
Optimized landing page UX to increase conversion rate to 35%.
Integrated with payment partner have higher success rate help revenue increase 50%.
Recalculated pricing structure helped increase margin and revenue.
_ FunPepper.com (Viral Quizzes)
Product Backlog management and Prioritizing User Stories using Redmine
Hold daily Scrum and Backlog grooming
Created user stories and working with UI/UX designers for product features
Defined short and long-term product vision and communicating it to the development team and stakeholders
Based on viral quizzes of a competitor and our own team, define patterns that help the quizzes went viral
again. 
Used A/B testing to test different UI helped increase share rate and user experience.
Prepared ad hoc reporting and analysis metrics for the management team.
Product Manager
2015-01 - 2016-01
Giaohangnhanh. vn - Best Delivery Ecommerce
Lead 2 core products: Delivery system and Customer Happiness System. Define process and improve
operation by metrics. Competitor Analysis and Product Strategy Deliver great feature with team help save
million dollars.
2013-01 - 2015-01
_ On Demand Delivery (New Services): Uber for delivery project
Calculated Feasibility of Project, Time to launch, Cost and Return on Invest.
Reviewed 150K record of delivery address, using Google Map API to calculate Avg amount orders, estimate
Avg salary of a delivery man.
Result: Avg salary is low the and we will have a big receives. Service will ready after one more year.
_ Quality Ontime delivery system:
Improved Ontime service rate from  46% to 99%. Added group detail tracking.
Added 10 metrics tracking breakdown by stations, by fail reason, area, client,… Operation fixes top 10 reasons
that we can control and simplify the process, cut cost by cut complex wasted step.
Result: Ontime service reaches 99% in 3 continuous months. Save millions dollar monthly.
Product Leader
NCT Corporation - Top Music Website
Management Trainee at (7 months) Studied about company structure, operation, and music industry.
Reviewed all function of company product, researched about competitors and gave an action plan to improve
the product.
Promoted to Product Leader, Managed a team working on data and function of website NhacCuaTui.com to
make customer happier.
My Standout Projects:
+ Produced best Music Search Tool: improve search ranking algorithm 
Reviewed quality search feature base on Google Analytics: 20% can't find their result on the first page.
Defined: Algorithm picks the most click result history data, suggest on the top automatically.
Result: improved over 90% user can find the song they want in first page.
+ Made algorithm remove cheater in Leaderboard Ranking:
Defined new Algorithm: A song ranking formula by Facebook like/view, time(newer is better), remove under 10
second view.
Result: Leaderboard increase 27% view, automatic remove cheater, promote new talent artist
2018 - 2018
2008 - 2012
2010 - 2010
Ajou University - ICT Global Program
Machine Learning, IoT, Big Data, Mobile Network, and technology business.
Bachelor of Computer Science - University of Science Ho Chi Minh
Algorithm, Database, OOP Programming, Software Development.
Developing Innovative Idea for New Companies - Coursera
Talent Management Team - AIESEC
Education Education

educations.major: Công nghệ kỹ thuật vật liệu xây dựng
educations.major_categories_detail: Công nghệ kỹ thuật kiến trúc và công trình xây dựng

educations.school: University of Science Ho Chi Minh
educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
